Enumeration Type Documentation

enum eolCameraTypes
Enumerator:
eolCameraEditor 

follows editor controls

eolCamera2D 

limits to 2D bounds of play area

eolCameraThird 

over the shoulder third person view of target entity

eolCameraFirst 

first person of the target entity

eolCameraCustom 

custom camera type.
